hi all ching

碧咸：難以想像槍手放山神

【now.com體育】雖然碧咸為其位於邁阿密的球會而忙碌，但仍心繫母會曼聯，對於新兵阿歷斯山齊士，他坦言難以想像阿仙奴會放人。

翼鋒阿歷斯山齊士早前從阿仙奴加盟曼聯，而後者攻中米希達利恩就改投阿仙奴；山神加盟後簽下一份4年半的合約。

「我仍然不敢想像這次轉會能夠成事，很神奇！」碧咸（David Beckham）表示。「以山神的地位及實力，從大球會阿仙奴改投更大規模的曼聯，令我作為紅魔球員感到自豪，因為我們都希望擁有偉大及令人興奮的球員。」

山神登陸紅魔後，穿上萬人迷當年的傳奇7號球衣，更已在英足盃初試蹄聲，立即交出2記助攻；這名智利國腳將會在周三首度為曼聯出戰英超，領軍作客熱刺。碧咸表示：「很高興看到他穿上曼聯球衣，我肯定他可以獲得成功。」

【now.com體育】據英國傳媒報道，多蒙特前鋒奧巴美揚即將以5540萬鎊轉會費加盟阿仙奴，雖然交易未正式完成，但有廠迷已經印定球衣，並預計奧巴美揚將會穿上14號。

有球迷已經急不及待印了奧巴美揚（Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang）的名字在阿仙奴球衣上，更預測他會穿上經典的14號球衣，14號球衣因阿仙奴巨星亨利而聞名，而對上一個穿上14號球衣的是剛轉會到愛華頓的禾確特。

球迷印定球衣歡迎奧巴美揚，不過亦有球迷社交網站表示不希望他穿上神聖的14號球衣，球迷Tom Patrick說，「請穿上其他號碼。」

外界預料阿仙奴日內便會完成這個破轉會紀錄交易，到時這位28歲的加蓬國腳將可以與前隊友米希達利恩重聚。米希達利恩剛成為阿歷斯山齊士的交換籌碼，由曼聯過檔阿仙奴。

擺明挖苦摩佬！MK急不及待踢進攻足球

【now.com體育】阿仙奴新援米希達利恩賣口乖，直言已急不及待與新隊友一起踢進攻足球。

阿美尼亞國腳米希達利恩（Henrikh Mkhitaryan）與阿歷斯山齊士互換東家，1月加盟阿仙奴，有望於今日英超作客史雲斯時上陣進行處子作。「得到領隊的尊重是非常重要，我明白雲加對球員的要求，也知道他喜歡球員冒險一點。」英國傳媒普遍認為，MK此說或多或少是諷刺前帥摩連奴不時鬥強隊時主守的戰術。

米希達利恩與摩連奴合作18個月，在進攻方面的發揮機會不多，效力紅魔期間，上陣63場射入13球，而近2個月只曾1次英超正選上陣，如今脫「魔」成「仙」自然希望事業新突破。

「進攻足球是我加盟阿仙奴的原因之一，大家都知道雲加是出色的領隊。」29歲的MK轉會後深盼有機會與前多蒙特隊友奧巴美揚再度合作，他不忘再當「說客」：「阿仙奴的進攻足球非常悅目，也是很多球員夢想的比賽風格，所以要來這兒其實不難作出取捨。」

AUBAMEYANG LATEST

Can Arsenal get a club record deal for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang over the line?

There's an 11pm deadline tomorrow night - but 5pm could also be a key time for Arsenal.

Arsenal have an agreement in principle with Borussia Dortmund worth around £60m but they'll only sign off on that if they get a replacement - and the deadline in Germany is 5pm.

Could that Dortmund arrival be the Chelsea striker Michy Batshuayi?

Aubameyang's arrival could mean Olivier Giroud leaves Arsenal, with Chelsea reportedly interested in the French striker. Should Giroud arrive at Chelsea, that could force Batshuayi to go out on loan - but to where?

We’re told Dortmund are interested in Batshuayi so there is a chance this could play out for all parties.

Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang: Olivier Giroud could have big say in Arsenal deal

Arsenal's £60m move for Borussia Dortmund forward Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang hinges on two more transfers being agreed.

And Gunners striker Olivier Giroud may have the biggest say in whether the deal is completed before Wednesday's 23:00 GMT deadline.

Arsenal have agreed a fee with Dortmund and personal terms with Gabon international Aubameyang, 28, but the German club will only sanction the move if they get a replacement.

BBC Sport's David Ornstein guides us through the complicated Aubameyang transfer merry-go-round...

Option one - the straight swap

Giroud was lined up as part of the deal to replace Aubameyang at Dortmund.

Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger is fond of Giroud, but the 31-year-old France striker has been told he will not get the game time he needs before this summer's World Cup in Russia.

But Chelsea, in the market for a tall target man, make an offer to Giroud, who would prefer to stay in London. So...

Option two - the three-way deal

Dortmund turn their attention to Blues striker Michy Batshuayi, who is allowed to leave - on loan - in January. The 24-year-old Belgium international is keen.

A seemingly simple solution presents itself: Aubameyang to Arsenal, Giroud to Chelsea and Batshuayi to Dortmund.

However, Chelsea are not keen to pay Arsenal's asking price for Giroud - a reported £30m-£35m. So...

Option three - enter Llorente

Exploring other options, Chelsea then hold talks with Tottenham to swap Batshuayi for Spanish forward Fernando Llorente, 32.

The Blues prefer a loan, Spurs are keen on a permanent deal - but Batshuayi rejects the move anyway because he wants to be a first-choice striker, not go from being behind Alvaro Morata at Stamford Bridge to being back-up for Harry Kane at Tottenham. So...

Option four... back to option two

Let's back this up and return to Aubameyang going to Arsenal, Batshuayi joining Dortmund and Giroud moving to Chelsea to complete the equation.

But will Arsenal reach an agreement with the Blues?

If not, will Chelsea find an alternative to replace Batshuayi?

If not, and Batshuayi stays, will Dortmund find another striker to replace Aubameyang? The Bundesliga side have previously said he will not be allowed to leave without an alternative in place.
